name: reparentItem(withIdentifier:toParentItemWithIdentifier:newName:completionHandler:)
desc: Moves the specified item into the given parent directory.
declaration:
func reparentItem(withIdentifier itemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier, 
toParentItemWithIdentifier parentItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier, 
          newName: String?, 
completionHandler: @escaping (NSFileProviderItem?, Error?) -> Void)
